comments.content: I don't know if it's a font actually (hope you're not expecting one reproducing Hulk's face trough letters ;) may be more a custom lettering or a heavily squooshed font... Part of the very specific /U bottom, it could be approximate with any generic fat black sans of your choice ( [Univers Extra Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020230245/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/univers/), [Helvetica](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020230245/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/helvetica) (Black or Compressed), [Compacta](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020230245/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/compacta), [Impact](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020230245/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/impact), [Haetschenweiler](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020230245/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/haettenschweiler)...) and manipulate it. The closest I was able to find is [Francker Ultra Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020230245/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/francker) though which comes very close. If you still need this logo, it is freely available to download [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020230245/http:/www.brandsoftheworld.com/logo/hulk).
Hi, thank you so much. I have a vehicle to brand for a rugby player, which nickname is Hulk. He wants his name on the vehicle in the "HULK" font. Thank you for your prompt reply. Helps a lot.
Another option would be a slightly squeezed [Antique Olive](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020230245/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/antique-olive/nord-d-regular/) …
